title: Extreme flourished font id
content:
Can anyone id this font for me??

Thank you!  
Jackie

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/48850147@N04/11872909203/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824091649/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/48850147@N04/11872909203/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/48850147@N04/11872909203/")
author: jackiej4

comments.content:
Could be [Poem Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824091649/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/poem-script-pro) by Sudtipos Ale Paul.  
Alternative: [Bellissima Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824091649/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/bellissima-script-pro) (also by Ale Paul)
